mapper.select:
select s.stuId,s.stuName,s.stuSex,s.stuAge,c.className,g.groupName,s.stuTel,s.stuStatus from student s left join class c on s.classId=c.classId left join groups g on s.groupId=g.groupId
s.stuName like '%${name}%'
and c.className=#{className}
and s.stuStatus='在读'
mapper.delete: delete from student where stuId=#{stuId} and stuStatus!='在读'
